Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.model

Class Application

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.model.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Application extends Object implements Serializable
The main container of the app, containing and managing all "storage"-segments.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final CalendarSegment
    calendarSegment
    The segment containing and managing all calendarEntries.
    private Mode
    currentMode
    A enum representing which mode is currently active. default = CALENDAR
    private final NoteSegment
    noteSegment
    The segment containing and managing all notes and notecollections.
    private final TodoSegment
    todoSegment
    The segment containing and managing all todoEntries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Application()
    A new Application is created and all segments are created, the calendars being generated with the systemTime at the time of the constructor-call.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEntry(Entry entry)
    Adds an Entry to its segment depending on its class.
    void
    editEntry(Entry entry)
    Changes the properties of the Entry, in its segment, that has the same date or id, as the given Entry, to the values of the given Entry.
    Mode
    getCurrentMode()
    Returns the current mode.
    Month
    getMonth()
    Returns the current month of the calendar- or noteSegment depending on which mode is active.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application()
      A new Application is created and all segments are created, the calendars being generated with the systemTime at the time of the constructor-call.

  • Method Details

    • switchMode

      public void switchMode(Mode mode)
      CurrentMode is changed to the given mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - The new mode.

      Returns a Day-array representing the current week of the calendar- or noteSegment depending on which mode is active.
      Returns:

    • getMonth

      public Month getMonth()
      Returns the current month of the calendar- or noteSegment depending on which mode is active.
      Returns:
      The current month.

    • getTodoList

      Returns the todoList.
      Returns:
      The todoList.

    • getSegment

      public Segment getSegment(Mode mode)
      Returns the segment of the given mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - The mode of the desired segment.
      Returns:
      The segment of the given mode.

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(Entry entry)
      Adds an Entry to its segment depending on its class.
      Parameters:
      entry - The Entry to be added.

    • removeEntry

      public void removeEntry(Entry entry, boolean absolute)
      Removes the given Entry from its segment.
      Parameters:
      entry - The Entry to be removed.
      absolute - A flag used for notes to decide if they are removed from collections as well. Irrelevant to other Entry-types.

    • editEntry

      public void editEntry(Entry entry)
      Changes the properties of the Entry, in its segment, that has the same date or id, as the given Entry, to the values of the given Entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The Entry containing the date or id of the Entry that is supposed to be changed and the new values for that Entry.
